thunnana polis pa්raharaya kamhalen sidu karana jala ha parisara dushanayata erehiwa digu kalinawa kala udghoshanayata kisidu pa්rathicharayak nolabuna thathwaye di 2014 marthu 16 da thunnane pawathi wirodhathawata sahabhagi wu 300kata aasanna nirayudha janayata polisiya wisin ella kala mlechcha pa්raharayen gammun kipa deneku barapathala lesa thuwala labu athara 60 denekuta wadi pirisak ath adanguwata path wuha.
